title: Best Of The Herd
itunes:title: Best Of The Herd
description:
Colin criticizes the Bears for putting a poor team around young quarterback Justin Fields who's destined to struggle in his second season. He pleads for the Steelers to start rookie Kenny Pickett over Mitchell Trubisky and start a new era in Pittsburgh. He also points out the issues the Patriots will have this year after weird reports regarding their coaching staff in training camp. Plus, Super Bowl Champion James Jones tells Colin what the Packer rookie WRs should expect playing with reigning MVP Aaron Rodgers. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
